Hedger Pressure Indicator

CoT hedger pressure: supply expansion & shortage stress.

As of 2025-10-14

Gemini Summary

State of the Market Summary:

  • The aggregated hedger pressure indicates normal market conditions as of 2025-10-14.
  • Both supply expansion and shortage pressure regimes are currently assessed as Normal.
  • On 2025-10-14, 68 out of 264 markets showed deep short hedger positioning.
  • 63 markets registered deep long hedger positioning on the same reporting date.
  • Shortage pressure had previously peaked at moderate stress levels in late September.

Technical Summary:

  • Robust z-scores for supply and shortage pressure remain below the 0.5 threshold.
  • `Hedger_ShortagePressure_z` declined from 0.9190 on 2025-09-23 to 0.4027 on 2025-10-14.
  • This indicates an unwinding of moderate shortage/stress signals observed previously.
  • `Hedger_SupplyPressure_z` is 0.2825, showing no significant supply expansion pressure.

References:

  • Hedger_Pressure_Indicators (latest timestamp: 2025-10-14 00:00:00).
  • The `Hedger_SupplyPressure_z` and `Hedger_ShortagePressure_z` regimes were most influential.
  • Commitments of Traders (CoT) disaggregated data for specific commodities.
  • Global macroeconomic indicators such as inventory levels.
